Up.Statement:
--------------------------[w2_MenuAuthority]------------------------------- IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM w2_MenuAuthority WHERE pkg_kbn = '1' AND menu_path in ('ProductRanking/','ProductGroup/','News/','SiteInformation/','ShortUrl/','PageDesign/','PartsDesign/','CSSDesign/','SeoMetadatas/','ProductListDispSetting/', 'ContentsManager/')) DELETE FROM w2_MenuAuthority WHERE pkg_kbn = '1' AND menu_path in ('ProductRanking/','ProductGroup/','News/','SiteInformation/','ShortUrl/','PageDesign/','PartsDesign/','CSSDesign/','SeoMetadatas/','ProductListDispSetting/', 'ContentsManager/') GO
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM w2_MenuAuthority WHERE pkg_kbn = '2' AND menu_path = 'TagManager/') DELETE FROM w2_MenuAuthority WHERE pkg_kbn = '2' AND menu_path = 'TagManager/' GO
